mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (order_uuid, member_id, air_key, call_first_name, call_last_name, call_country, call_email, call_number,ride_first_name, ride_last_name,ride_birth,ride_country,ride_passport,ride_passport_country,ride_passport_exdate, order_time,status,payment_key) VALUES (#{orderUuid}, #{memberId}, #{airKey}, #{callFirstName}, #{callLastName}, #{callCountry}, #{callEmail}, #{callNumber},#{rideFirstNameStr}, #{rideLastNameStr},#{rideBirthStr},#{rideCountryStr},#{ridePassportStr},#{ridePassportCountryStr},#{ridePassportExdateStr},Now(),#{status},#{paymentKey})
